review: I pretty much work out of my car 8 hours per day. I use this tray mostly for writing notes or using my bluetooth keyboard. I haven't used it for eating, but I'm sure it would fine. I gave it 4 stars because while this product is useful, the tray does not securely attach to the steering wheel. I'm not sure I would place my food or drink on this tray and trust the tray won't slip or detach from the steering wheel, creating a huge mess.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray (gray)
